summary: This module provides test utilities and a test case aimed at validating the behavior of sparse node embeddings under multiprocessing in a PyTorch environment using DGL. It includes helper routines for initializing embeddings and launching worker processes, as well as a test that attempts to set and retrieve embedding values concurrently.
business_intent: Ensure that sparse embedding operations are correctly synchronized and functional when accessed from multiple processes, supporting reliable distributed training and inference workflows.
